data.comment: Millwall kick-off the first half - the match is underway!
The away team replace Rico Henry with Dominic Thompson.
In the minute 4, Goal! The home team take a 1-0 lead through Jed Wallace.
At The Den, Dominic Thompson has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Millwall's Mahlon Romeo has been booked in London.
An attacking Brentford player has been brought down in the area - penalty!
In the minute 20, Shaun Hutchinson (Millwall) has received a yellow card from David Coote.
Goal! The away team are now level through a Ivan Toney penalty.
In the minute 45, The first half has been concluded at The Den.
It's Brentford with the kick-off after the break.
Ryan Leonard is booked for the home team.
In the minute 73, Thomas Frank is making the team's second substitution at The Den with Said Benrahma replacing Sergi Canos.
The away team have replaced Joshua Da Silva with Mathias Jensen. This is the third substitution made today by Thomas Frank.
Millwall make their first substitution with Connor Mahoney replacing Tom Bradshaw.
In the minute 79, Jon Dadi BÃ¶dvarsson is replacing Mason Bennett for the home team.
David Coote blows to end the match. The final score is 1-1.
Murray Wallace is on a sub for Scott Malone for Millwall.
